Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded a double-double with 30 points and 12 rebounds
The Pacers fell behind by 19 points in the first half but rallied to close the gap
Post-Match Reflections: Giannis Antetokounmpo shook off a slow first half and led the Bucks to victory
The Pacers' Thomas Bryant scored an and-1
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks rallied from a 19-point deficit to win 120-112
Milwaukee and Indiana have played 2 games this season; the Bucks lead 2-0
